span.span: For your safety, the cafeteria has a drive-through set up,Â handing out all 5 days of meals for each child (lunch and breakfast) each Monday between 11:00 and 12:00 at the elementary main entrance. You can stay in your vehicle, meals are delivered curbside.Â If you are unable to pick up the meals on Monday,
please call cafeteria director Brenda Marshall atÂ

p.span: Â 936-326-4890 ext. 262 and let her know your name, number, address, student names, and how many meals are needed. You can leave a message if after hours or no answer.
